CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 5, 1963, pg. 5 reads: "Fallen Stairway - Children play on the left-over of a fallen stairway loading into the home of Mrs. Louise Lewis and Mrs. Elves Kea, at 29 Vine St. The staircase collapsed under the weight of an unsuspecting mailman, last Wednesday.  Since then, the tenants, other than the children, have been imprisoned in their home. - Harris PHoto."
TitMainTitle: Children playing on dilapidated wooden staircase leading to row house at 29 Vine Street
